https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/knowledge-center/lambda-configure-s3-event-notification/

AutomationAssumeRole.description: (Optional) The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that allows Systems Manager Automation to perform the actions on your behalf. If no role is specified, Systems Manager Automation uses the permissions of the user that starts this runbook.

LambdaFunctionArn.description: Enter Arn of the Lambdafunction in the format - arn:aws:lambda:<aws-region>:<account-id>:function:<functionName>:<version -optional>
